# title

**Instance Property**

The title of the shape annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
var title: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The shape displays this string in the callout for the associated annotation view. The default value of this property is `nil`.

## Related Documentation

- **Location and Maps Programming Guide**

## Accessing the shape attributes

- **subtitle**: The subtitle of the shape annotation.

items.description: The subtitle of the shape annotation.
items.name: subtitle
